ballot_measures.title: Citizenship Requirement for Voting Amendment
ballot_measures.description: Provide that only U.S. citizens may vote in state or local elections. This legislatively referred constitutional amendment is on the Arkansas 2026 ballot.

ballot_measures.number: Creation of Economic Development Districts Amendment
ballot_measures.title: Creation of Economic Development Districts Amendment
ballot_measures.description: Allow the legislature to create programs, including Economic Development Districts, and make loans and grants of public money to develop the state economy. This legislatively referred constitutional amendment is on the Arkansas 2026 ballot.

ballot_measures.title: Natural Resources Commission Bond Measure
ballot_measures.description: Authorize the Arkansas Natural Resources Commission to issue up to $500 million in general obligation bonds to fund water-related infrastructure projects including water treatment and transportation, waste disposal, pollution abatement, drainage, irrigation, flood control, and wetlands and aquatic resources infrastructure. This legislative referendum is on the Arkansas 2026 ballot.

ballot_measures.number: Right to Keep and Bear Arms Amendment
ballot_measures.title: Right to Keep and Bear Arms Amendment
ballot_measures.description: Provide that the right to keep and bear arms is "a natural, fundamental, and individual right that shall not be infringed". This legislatively referred constitutional amendment is on the Arkansas 2026 ballot.
